events.description:
Introduction
Prompt Engineering has emerged as a critical skill in the modern AI-driven landscape. For engineers, keeping pace with this evolution is no longer optional but an industry-level expectation. Prompt Engineering focuses on the structured and creative formulation of inputs that guide AI systems to produce intended and meaningful outputs.

In this context, the Computer Engineering Innovation and Tech Club (CITC) proposes an AI-based creative competition titled ‚ÄúPrompt to Image.‚Äù This event aims to provide students with a practical platform to explore prompt design, understand human‚ÄìAI interaction, and demonstrate creativity by transforming textual prompts into compelling visual outputs using AI tools.

Objectives of the Event
The primary objectives of the Prompt to Image competition are:
‚Ä¢ To encourage creative and innovative use of Artificial Intelligence
‚Ä¢ To develop practical skills in prompt engineering
‚Ä¢ To enable students to express ideas, emotions, and social issues through AI-generated visuals
‚Ä¢ To enhance digital creativity, innovation, and technological awareness
‚Ä¢ To promote intra-college participation and collaboration
‚Ä¢ To promote ethical and responsible use of AI technologies

Event Description and Execution Plan
The Prompt to Image competition is designed to evaluate participants‚Äô creativity, storytelling ability, and understanding of prompt engineering rather than dependence on advanced or premium AI tools.

To ensure fairness, originality, and consistency, participants will be provided with a structured paragraph-based prompt framework containing predefined blank spaces. This approach ensures equal creative opportunity for all participants while emphasizing logical thinking and narrative coherence.

Prompt Framework Design
Each participant will receive one standardized paragraph template prepared by the organizing committee. The paragraph will contain multiple blank sections that participants must creatively complete.

Sample Prompt Framework (Illustrative):
"In a future where ‚Ä¶ dominates society, a ‚Ä¶ stands in the middle of ‚Ä¶ The atmosphere feels ‚Ä¶, symbolizing ‚Ä¶ Soft ‚Ä¶ surrounds the scene, while ‚Ä¶ represents hope, conflict, or transformation. The visual style reflects ‚Ä¶ , capturing a message about ‚Ä¶"

Participants must fill in all blanks while maintaining:
‚Ä¢ Logical flow
‚Ä¢ Originality
‚Ä¢ Creative storytelling
‚Ä¢ Ethical sensitivity
The completed paragraph will serve as the final prompt used to generate the AI-based image.

Evaluating Criteria
The final score will be calculated based on:

1. Judges‚Äô Evaluation (60%)
Submissions will be evaluated by multiple judges using a structured rubric to ensure fairness.
‚Ä¢ Creativity & Originality (15%)
‚Ä¢ Prompt Quality & Human Intent (15%)
‚Ä¢ Visual Appeal & Prompt‚ÄìImage Alignment (15%)
‚Ä¢ Concept Explanation & Reasoning (10%)
‚Ä¢ Ethical & Responsible AI Use (5%)

2. Public / Social Engagement (40%)
Engagement will be measured from official competition posts shared through CITC-designated platforms.
‚Ä¢ Likes / Reactions (15%)
‚Ä¢ Shares / Reposts (15%)
‚Ä¢ Comments (10%)
